sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.MLSchemaHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MLSchemaHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var MLSchemaHelper = Class.create();
MLSchemaHelper.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getMLSchema: function(){
		if(!gs.hasRole('ml_admin'))
			return {};
		var schema = {
			'schema_table':'ml_solution_definition',
			'schema_field':'solution_definition'
		};
		if (gs.getProperty('glide.platform_ml.use_new_schema',false) == 'true'){
			schema.schema_field = "ml_capability_definition";
			schema.schema_table = "ml_capability_definition_base";
		}
		return schema;
	},
    type: 'MLSchemaHelper'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-08-23 20:49:08</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0e26910c5f633300d1dc4560be731324</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MLSchemaHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Predictive Intelligence" source="com.glide.platform_ml">c41430683c31311068bcf327dfe37f28</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0e26910c5f633300d1dc4560be731324</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-12-06 09:35:18</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
